terms.name: api
terms.definition:
Application Programming Interface - A set of rules and protocols that allows different software applications to communicate with each other. See also [[rest|RESTful API]].
  • [[apix|APIx]]

terms.name: apix
terms.definition: Application Programming Interface - A set of rules and protocols that allows different software applications to communicate with each other. See also [[restx|RESTful API2]]..

terms.name: rest
terms.definition: Representational State Transfer - An architectural style for designing networked applications. RESTful APIs use HTTP requests to perform CRUD operations.

terms.name: restx
terms.definition: Representational State Transfer - An architectural style for designing networked applications. RESTful APIs use HTTP requests to perform CRUD operations.

terms.name: vue
terms.definition: A progressive JavaScript framework for building user interfaces. It's designed to be incrementally adoptable and can be used to build single-page applications ([[spa]]).

terms.name: spa
terms.definition: Single Page Application - A web application that loads a single HTML page and dynamically updates it as the user interacts with the app. See also [[vue|Vue.js framework]].
